body.p: The IASB decided not to include in the revised IFRS 3 guidance on using valuation techniques to measure the acquisition‑date fair value of the acquirer’s interest in the acquiree. The IASB has on its agenda a project to develop guidance on measuring fair value. While deliberations on that project are in progress, the IASB considers it inappropriate to include fair value measurement guidance in IFRSs.
